snippet: An interview with Marc Bamuthi Joseph about "Word Becomes Flesh," his spoken word piece which returns to the Under the Radar festival in New York, this time enacted by five other performers.
abstract: An interview with Marc Bamuthi Joseph about "Word Becomes Flesh," his spoken word piece which returns to the Under the Radar festival in New York, this time enacted by five other performers.

headline.main: Under the Radar: 5 Questions About 'Word Becomes Flesh'
